CustomField.description: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Approver" may review the document but can't approve the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may approve the document.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Approver" may review the document but can't approve the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may approve the document.
CustomField.label: Enable Recipient Delegate Approver Role
